name: Another God of War Manhua
author: 九夏动漫
content: Ye Feng, the most mysterious legend of the Dragon Nation and the revered master of the Dragon God Hall, returns to Jiang City after five years. With unmatched power, he crushes corrupt elites, avenges his family, and protects his beloved wife. His wrath shakes the heavens, and his might commands the seas. The Dragon God returns—ready to dominate the world once more!
